name: The Bistro

address.full: Avenida Engenheiro Domingos Ferreira 4661, Recife, Pernambuco 51021-040

description: The Bistro at Courtyard Recife Boa Viagem hotel offers a wide variety of breakfast and dinner choices, making it the place to go. The bistro also counts with a variety of drinks, from Starbucks drinks all the way to cocktails and wines.
